thread.title: Win a pair of tickets to dine with rugby royalty at The Rugby Captains Dinner thanks to DHL Africa
thread.title_full: Win a pair of tickets to dine with rugby royalty at The Rugby Captains Dinner thanks to DHL Africa - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a pair of tickets to dine with rugby royalty at The Rugby Captains Dinner thanks to DHL Africa
text: The DHL Africa As One campaign is giving you the chance to dine with rugby royalty. Win a pair of tickets to attend The Captains Dinner black tie event and mix with rugby and other sporting legends, an unforgettable experience delivered by DHL Africa. Event details When: 16th September 2015 Where: Battersea Evolution, London The captains: Martin Johnson - Captain, England 2003 David Kirk - Captain, New Zealand 1987 Nick Farr-Jones - Captain, Australia 1991 Francois Pienaar - Captain, South Africa 1995 John Eales - Captain, Australia, 1999 What's included: Hosted Q & A sessions with all six captains Individual story telling of their career highlights Predictions and insights into the forth coming 2015 World Cup Further guest appearances by sporting legends Spectacular live auction with once in a lifetime opportunities Award-winning food by Angela Hartnett Exclusive live entertainment Unforgettable after-party until the early hours Valued at Â£249 pp To stand a chance to win tell us who is the official logistics sponsor of Rugby World Cup 2015 and fill in the form below. Competition ends Wednesday, 16 September 2015 at 10am Online Form - Win a pair of tickets to dine with rugby royalty at The Rugby Captains Dinner thanks to DHL Africa telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
